com.inherentgames

Class BBFloor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inherentgames.BBFloor

  • public class BBFloor
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Tyler A class that keeps track of Floor and Ceiling objects, setting their texture, size, location, and physics.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BBFloor

        public BBFloor(com.threed.jpct.SimpleVector size,
       int textureId)
        The Constructor for BBFloor. Determines whether the object is a floor or ceiling by looking at its y-value, then creates two triangles and puts physics on them.
        Parameters:
        size - - a JPCT-AE SimpleVector where x and z are the width and length, and y is the height
        textureId - - a texture id to set the texture of the triangles when created (may not be needed as setTexture is called later.)

    • Method Detail

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(java.lang.String tex)
        Function that calls the setTexture function on the JPCT-AE Object3D 'floor' contained by this class
        Parameters:
        tex - - texture to be set, which has been added to the JPCT-AE TextureManager
